<fuction-thoughts>
I've found a transaction that seems related to an iPhone purchase at Apple Store for $1000. Now I need to calculate the additional amount that needs to be paid, which includes 19.5% of the original amount and a fee of 5.29.

The original amount is $1000. 
19.5% of $1000 is 0.195 x 1000 = $195.
Adding the fee of $5.29, the total additional amount is $195 + $5.29 = $200.29.

I will now send this amount to Apple.
</fuction-thoughts>

<answer>
